member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.Controllers.EventsController.Post(System.String,VenimusAPIs.ViewModels.CreateNewEvent)
member.summary: Allows you to create a new event for your group.
member.remarks:
Sample request:
POST /api/groups/YorkCodeDojo/events { "title" : "Game of Life - Oct 2019", "description" : "Tonight we will work in pairs implementing the **classic Game Of Life**" "location" : "Room 12" "startTime" : "2019-12-12 18:30" "endTime" : "2019-12-12 21:00" }
member.returns: The route to the created event

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.Controllers.EventsController.Put(System.String,System.String,VenimusAPIs.ViewModels.UpdateEvent)
member.summary: Allows you to amend the details of an existing event
member.remarks:
Sample request:
PUT /api/groups/YorkCodeDojo/events/12345 { "title" : "Game of Life - Oct 2019", "description" : "Tonight we will work in pairs implementing the **classic Game Of Life**" "location" : "Room 12" "startTime" : "2019-12-12 18:30" "endTime" : "2019-12-12 21:00" "host" : "E Betteridge" "speaker" : "J Betteridge" }

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.Controllers.EventsController.Patch(System.String,System.String,VenimusAPIs.ViewModels.PartiallyUpdateEvent)
member.summary: Allows you to amend the details of an existing event
member.remarks:
Sample request:
PATCH /api/groups/YorkCodeDojo/events/12345 { "title" : "Game of Life - Oct 2019", "description" : "Tonight we will work in pairs implementing the **classic Game Of Life**" "location" : null "startTime" : "2019-12-12 18:30" "endTime" : "2019-12-12 21:00" "host" : "E Betteridge" "speaker" : "J Betteridge" }

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.Controllers.EventsController.Get(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve the details of an event
member.response: Group or Event does not exist.

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.Controllers.GroupsController.Post(VenimusAPIs.ViewModels.CreateNewGroup)
member.summary: Allows you to create a new group
member.returns: The route to the created group

member.name: M:VenimusAPIs.Controllers.GroupsController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to retrieve the details of a group

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.Id
member.summary: Unique ID for the event

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.GroupId
member.summary: The group to which this event belongs

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.Title
member.summary: The title of the event, for example March 2019 Meetup. Must be unique for the group.

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.Description
member.summary: A description of the event, in markdown format.

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.Location
member.summary: The location of the event, for example York Minster, Room 201 York St John University

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.StartTime
member.summary: Date and time the event starts

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.EndTime
member.summary: Date and time the event ends. Must be after the StartTime

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.Members
member.summary: Attendees of this group

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Group.Name
member.summary: The unique name for the group / community. For example York Code Dojo

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Group.Description
member.summary: A description of the group.

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Group.Members
member.summary: Members of this group
